Hymn.Arabic: 39- اما خلاص الصديقين فمن قبل الرب حصنهم في زمان الضيق.
Hymn.English: 39 But the salvation of the righteous is from the Lord; He is their strength in the time of trouble.

Hymn.Arabic: 40- و يعينهم الرب و ينجيهم ينقذهم من الاشرار
Hymn.English: 40 And the Lord shall help them and deliver them.
40 And save them, Because they trust in Him.     Alleluia
